name: remote-peon
description: Audio notifications for AI coding agents — works over Remote-SSH and code-server

remotePeon.pack.description: Active sound pack ID. Must match a folder name in the packs directory.

remotePeon.eventFile.description: Path to the event file written by the hook script. Must match REMOTE_PEON_EVENT_FILE in the hook.

remotePeon.debounceMs.description: Minimum milliseconds between sounds. Prevents spam during rapid events.

remotePeon.sounds.greeting.description: Play a sound when the agent starts.

remotePeon.sounds.acknowledge.description: Play a sound on each tool use (spammy — disabled by default).

remotePeon.sounds.permission.description: Play a sound when the agent needs your approval.

remotePeon.sounds.complete.description: Play a sound when the agent finishes a task.

remotePeon.sounds.error.description: Play a sound when the agent hits an error.

remotePeon.sounds.annoyed.description: Play an easter egg sound occasionally.

remotePeon.autoInstallHooks.description: Automatically install Claude Code hooks when the extension activates.

remotePeon.showStatusBar.description: Show agent status in the status bar.

remotePeon.usePolling.description: Use polling (fs.watchFile) instead of inotify (fs.watch). Enable if fs.watch is unreliable on your filesystem (NFS, FUSE).

remotePeon.pollingIntervalMs.description: Polling interval in ms when usePolling is enabled.
